# Single Nuclei RNA Sequencing for MND Muscle

Welcome to the single nuclei analysis website for [*Impaired signaling for neuromuscular synaptic maintenance is a feature of Motor Neuron Disease*](https://actaneurocomms.biomedcentral.com/articles?query=Impaired+signaling+for+neuromuscular+synaptic+maintenance+is+a+feature+of+Motor+Neuron+Disease&volume=&searchType=&tab=keyword) by Ding *et al.*, published in *Acta Neuropathologica Communications*.

## Raw Code and Data

You can find the raw *R* code in the *analysis* folder of our [GitHub repository](https://github.com/Cadaei-Yuvxvs/snRNAseq_muscle_MND).

For the raw single nuclei dataset, please visit our [UQ eSpace repository](https://doi.org/10.48610/0106c8e).
